name: Maru's Mission Re-toned
description:
This is a demonstration ROM intended for use with the original DMG Game Boy or Game Boy Pocket and a companion to Gumpy Function's Development Workflow Chapter 6: Readability articles Part 1 and Part 2, found at GB Studio Central.

The article uses Maru's Mission, a game published in 1990 by Jaleco to explore problems relating to readability in Game Boy games. This demonstration covers tone, contrast and blurred graphics during sprite motion/background scrolling.

Download the ROM and flash to a cart to play on real hardware.

DISCLAIMER: This ROM is intended for learning purposes only, and NOT intended for sale or profit. All trademarked characters belong to their respective owners.
